00039                 virtual SpecHeatCap speccp(const SteamCalculator &c) const;
00040                 virtual SpecHeatCap speccv(const SteamCalculator &c) const;
00041 
00042                 virtual Temperature temp(const SteamCalculator &c) const;
00043                 virtual Pressure pres(const SteamCalculator &c) const;
00044                 virtual Density dens(const SteamCalculator &c) const;
00045

00047                 int Region1::getRegion() const;
